Jockey Michael Dee was taken to hospital for assessment of a shoulder injury after a fall while pulling up following at race at Sunday’s Pakenham Synthetic meeting.

articles.title: Larissa Behrendt to investigate Heritier Lumumba allegations of racism at Collingwood - The Guardian

articles.content: Collingwood have appointed professor Larissa Behrendt to lead the investigation into allegations of racism levelled at the AFL club by former player Heritier Lumumba, expecting it to produce a full a… [+1400 chars]
